# Vendored Dependencies

This folder contains third-party libraries vendored into the project.

## Chart.js

- **Version:** 3.9.1
- **Date Added:** 2026-01-25
- **License:** MIT
- **Source:** https://github.com/chartjs/Chart.js/releases/tag/v3.9.1
- **File:** chart.min.js (~195KB)
- **Frozen:** Do NOT update without extensive testing

### Why Chart.js 3.9.1?

- Battle-tested, stable release
- Wide browser compatibility (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
- No breaking changes expected
- Works offline completely
- Zero runtime dependencies

### Why Vendored?

- ✅ Works 100% offline
- ✅ Version locked forever
- ✅ No CDN dependency
- ✅ No external network calls
- ✅ Fast local loading
- ✅ Security auditable
- ✅ No supply chain risks

### Update Policy

**DO NOT UPDATE** unless:
1. Critical security vulnerability discovered
2. Critical bug affecting STATCOM operations
3. Extensive testing completed after update
4. Full regression test of all chart functionality
